casebody.data:
Saul C. TOUCHET, petitioner,
v.
ESTIS WELL SERVICE, L.L.C., et al. No. 17-346. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 8, 2018.

Motion of Seafarers' Rights International for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Global Maritime Ministries, Inc. New Orleans for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
